Description:
Komichi Tetsujou (鉄条径, Tetsujou Komichi) is a math teacher at Naoetsu Private high School. She was the homeroom teacher of class 1-3 in which Koyomi, Sodachi and Hitagi were part of. She is currently also the teacher of the 3rd year class in which Koyomi, Hitagi and Tsubasa are part of.
She is presently absent as she took on a maternity leave.
